pages.title: L2Hostility
pages.text: $(br)The game uses $(bold)L2Hostility$() to control $(key)difficulty$(). Killing powerful mobs increases your $(key)difficulty$(), while dying decreases it. Mobs can spawn with special abilities called $(key)"traits"$().$(br2)The higher a mob's $(key)level$(), the higher its $(bold)damage$() and $(bold)health$(), and the stronger its $(key)traits$(). Every $(key)trait$() has its own counterplay.

pages.title: Invisibility/Repelling/Pulling
pages.text: $(br)Mobs with $(key)traits$() are powerful, but not unbeatable. Here are some ways to counter traits:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Invisibility$(): wearing $(key)Detector Glasses$() lets you see invisible mobs.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Repelling/Pulling$(): the $(key)Insulator$() enchantment can mitigate the repelling/pulling effect.

pages.title: Debuff Traits
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Weakness/Quicksand/Poison/Wither/Blindness/Distortion/Levitation/Soul Burner/Freezing/Cursed$():$(br)$(key)Ring of Divinity$() or $(key)Ring of Reflection$() can make you immune to almost all negative effects. Alternatively, you can use the $(bold)exclusive enchantments$() of the $(boss/t4/old_champion)Breastplate$() to become immune to specific debuffs.

pages.title: Regenerate/Undying/Dispell
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Regenerate/Undying$(): applying a curse effect to mobs can prevent them from regenerating health. This can be achieved with the $(key)Spell Curse$() enchantment.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Dispell$(): the $(key)Spell Tearing$() enchantment, $(key)Spell Prism$(), and $(key)Imagine Breaker$() all allow spell damage to pierce Dispell's protection.

pages.title: Adaptive
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Adaptive$(): besides using debuffs, you can also refresh a mob's adaptation by $(bold)switching$() spells â€” each spell counts as a different damage type. The $(key)Anti-Adaptation$() enchantment makes spells harder to adapt to, or you can use $(key)Spell Prism$() / $(key)Imagine Breaker$() to pierce Adaptive's protection.

pages.title: Corrosion/Erosion/Split/Teleport
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Corrosion/Erosion$(): the $(mechanic/durability#hardened)Hardened$() enchantment greatly reduces durability damage to your gear.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Split$(): the $(key)Split Suppression$() enchantment prevents mobs from splitting.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Teleport$(): you can apply $(key)Imprisonment$() to mobs with the $(key)Ring of Imprisonment$() or a $(key)Blackflame Bomb$() to prevent them from teleporting.

pages.title: Spell Traits
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Spell Traits$(): you can use $(key)Ring of Divinity$() or a $(mage/spell_container)Spell Container$() to reduce enemy spell damage against you. Later in the game, you can become completely immune to enemy spell damage with $(key)Magic Immune$().

pages.title: Arena/Ragnarok
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Arena$(): you can place or break blocks inside the arena with $(mage/spell#place)Remote Manipulation$() or $(mage/spell#break)Remote Disintegration$().$(br)$(list)$(bold)Ragnarok$(): a $(key)Dispel Pouch$() can automatically remove seals from your equipment.
